Learning Resource

# Yarn Troubleshoot

# Problem : yarn global nggak jalan di linux

# solusi :

Confirm your global bin path

yarn global bin

I got: /home/username/.yarn/bin set yarn prefix: make sure your yarn prefix is the parent directory of your bin directory. You can confirm by running

yarn config get prefix when I ran this, my prefix was empty, so I set it:

yarn config set prefix ~/.yarn

add the following to ~/.bash_profile or ~/.bashrc

export PATH="$PATH:`yarn global bin`"

for zsh users, be sure to add this line to ~/.zshrc

restart your shell or start a new one

bash -l or zsh
